title: The Simplest Way to Heal and Cure a Zombie Villager in Minecraft

steps.title: Get the necessary items first.
steps.content: Get the necessary items first. You'll need a splash potion of weakness and a golden apple. You can make the weakness potion with a fermented spider eye and bottle of water with a brewing stand, and the golden apples can either be found or crafted with one apple and eight gold ingots. As an alternative to this, you can instead make arrows of weakness to be more efficient. (if you are in java edition, you need lingering potions to do this, but in bedrock you only need a cauldron). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Trap the villager.
steps.content: Trap the villager. Make sure it can't escape. If your villagers are in compartments, then it is already trapped and this step is safe to skip. Keep the villager out of any direct sunlight; if it gets into the sunlight, it will burn. At this point you should also keep it away from iron golems, as they will attack and kill it.

steps.title: Splash the zombie with the potion of weakness, or shoot it with your arrow of weakness.
steps.content: Splash the zombie with the potion of weakness, or shoot it with your arrow of weakness. You can use a crossbow enchanted with piercing to recover the arrow after.

steps.title: Right click on the villager with the golden apple.
steps.content: Right click on the villager with the golden apple. Make sure to do this quickly, before the weakness effect wears off. If you are on mobile, hold down on the villager with your finger or aim the camera at them and press the "cure" button that appears. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for the transformation to occur.
steps.content: Wait for the transformation to occur. The zombie villager will begin shaking. It should take around 4 minutes for the villager to be cured. You can speed up the process by putting iron bars and a bed near the curing zombie. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Free the villager.
steps.content: Free the villager. Let it go about its normal business once it has transformed. If your villagers are in compartments, skip this step.

steps.title: Note the benefits of the cured villager.
steps.content: Note the benefits of the cured villager. The villager will now have significantly reduced prices, normal trades decreasing by 5 in cost and special trades like enchanted books by 20. Other villagers will also decrease their prices slightly.
